ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] gem cutter
ygData.msgSnippet: When i created i used about 8 of them (talk about a money eater) i tried almost everything some jewler said right click on a gem with the gemchopper on the
ygData.messageBody:
When i created i used about 8 of them (talk about a money eater) i tried
almost everything some jewler said right click on a gem with the gemchopper
on the mouse and right click and it will return a "Fine" gem and it never
worked. i put a gemchopper in the jewelers kit and combined to make a
gemchopper kit if it worked that way. combined with a gem in tollbox didn't
combine in that quanity. Salastil
